channel.title: Jarring Client
channel.description: I followed all of these tutorials and I do not get any errors while I create the jar or sign it but when I run the client I jarred it does not open up the client. here is all of the info and everything please help me find out what I am doing wrong. Thanks!

item.title: Jarring Client
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

search for the word “deathlypvpz” and you’ll find it.

Read full topic

item.title: Jarring Client
item.dc:creator: @dr_rich_bee dr rich bee
item.description:
@dr_rich_bee wrote:

thank you for that it is opening up now but the weird thing is it is trying to auto download a deathlypvpz cache instead of my updated one. But when I use the auto cache downloader on my regular client it downloads my cache from the drop box just fine. any idea why it would do that?

Read full topic

item.title: Jarring Client
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Change the main class from Client.exe to Client.class

Read full topic
